# Load required libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(purrr)
library(broom)
```

# Load the dataset
```{r}
baby_weight <- read_delim("https://www.openintro.org/data/tab-delimited/babies.txt", delim = "\t")

baby_weight
```
Some NA values have been observed. They are removed.

```{r}
baby_weight <- baby_weight %>%
  drop_na()

baby_weight
```
